Question.Subject: Why wont my Ebay photos upload right?
Question.Content:
All my photos are lightened a little bit before being uploaded :)
-The photos just kept loading and never completed -The photos loaded but then said they had an error -The photo wasnt viewable, so I got the original one to upload as a test, it worked, then I flipped it the right way and it failed
Please, this is really frustrating! Thanks so much xD
Question.ChosenAnswer: flip the photo the way u want it then save it as a different file name and use that one. Hope this helps

Answer.Content: flip the photo the way u want it then save it as a different file name and use that one. Hope this helps
